verses.verse: וַתָּ֣שַׁר <S%H7891><s%> Then sang דְּבוֹרָ֔ה <S%H1683><s%> Deborah וּבָרָ֖ק <S%H1301><s%> and Barak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲבִינֹ֑עַם <S%H42><s%> of Abinoam בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

בִּפְרֹ֤עַ <S%H6544><s%> led פְּרָעוֹת֙ <S%H6546><s%> the leaders בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּהִתְנַדֵּ֖ב <S%H5068><s%> willingly offered עָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> when the people בָּרֲכ֖וּ <S%H1288><s%> Praise יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> ye the LORD

שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear מְלָכִ֔ים <S%H4428><s%> O ye kings הַאֲזִ֖ינוּ <S%H238><s%> give ear רֹֽזְנִ֑ים <S%H7336><s%> O ye princes אָֽנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I אָשִׁ֔ירָה <S%H7891><s%> I [even] I will sing אֲזַמֵּ֕ר <S%H2167><s%> I will sing לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [praise] to the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD בְּצֵאתְךָ֤ <S%H3318><s%> when thou wentest out מִשֵּׂעִיר֙ <S%H8165><s%> of Seir בְּצַעְדְּךָ֙ <S%H6805><s%> when thou marchedst out מִשְּׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth רָעָ֔שָׁה <S%H7493><s%> trembled גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also שָׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> and the heavens נָטָ֑פוּ <S%H5197><s%> dropped גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even עָבִ֖ים <S%H5645><s%> the clouds נָ֥טְפוּ <S%H5197><s%> also dropped מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water

הָרִ֥ים <S%H2022><s%> The mountains נָזְל֖וּ <S%H5140><s%> melted מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This סִינַ֔י <S%H5514><s%> [even] that Sinai מִפְּנֵ֕י <S%H6440><s%> from before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

בִּימֵ֞י <S%H3117><s%> In the days שַׁמְגַּ֤ר <S%H8044><s%> of Shamgar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲנָת֙ <S%H6067><s%> of Anath בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> in the days יָעֵ֔ל <S%H3278><s%> of Jael חָדְל֖וּ <S%H2308><s%> were unoccupied אֳרָח֑וֹת <S%H734><s%> the highways וְהֹלְכֵ֣י <S%H1980><s%> and the travellers נְתִיב֔וֹת <S%H5410><s%> path יֵלְכ֕וּ <S%H1980><s%> went אֳרָח֖וֹת <S%H734><s%> ways עֲקַלְקַלּֽוֹת׃ <S%H6128><s%> roundabout

חָדְל֧וּ <S%H2308><s%> ceased פְרָז֛וֹן <S%H6520><s%> [The inhabitants of] the villages בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel חָדֵ֑לּוּ <S%H2308><s%> they ceased עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> Until שַׁקַּ֙מְתִּי֙ <S%H6965><s%> arose דְּבוֹרָ֔ה <S%H1683><s%> until that I Deborah שַׁקַּ֥מְתִּי <S%H6965><s%> that I arose אֵ֖ם <S%H517><s%> a mother בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

יִבְחַר֙ <S%H977><s%> They chose אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods חֲדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2319><s%> new אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> Then לָחֶ֣ם <S%H3901><s%> then [was] war שְׁעָרִ֑ים <S%H8179><s%> in the gates מָגֵ֤ן <S%H4043><s%> was there a shield אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יֵֽרָאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> seen וָרֹ֔מַח <S%H7420><s%> or spear בְּאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> among forty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

לִבִּי֙ <S%H3820><s%> My heart לְחוֹקְקֵ֣י <S%H2710><s%> [is] toward the governors יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַמִּֽתְנַדְּבִ֖ים <S%H5068><s%> that offered themselves willingly בָּעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> among the people בָּרֲכ֖וּ <S%H1288><s%> Bless יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> ye the LORD

רֹכְבֵי֩ <S%H7392><s%> ye that ride אֲתֹנ֨וֹת <S%H860><s%> asses צְחֹר֜וֹת <S%H6715><s%> on white יֹשְׁבֵ֧י <S%H3427><s%> ye that sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִדִּ֛ין <S%H4055><s%> in judgment וְהֹלְכֵ֥י <S%H1980><s%> and walk עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way שִֽׂיחוּ׃ <S%H7878><s%> Speak

מִקּ֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [They that are delivered] from the noise מְחַֽצְצִ֗ים <S%H2686><s%> of archers בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> among מַשְׁאַבִּ֔ים <S%H4857><s%> in the places of drawing water שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> There יְתַנּוּ֙ <S%H8567><s%> there shall they rehearse צִדְק֣וֹת <S%H6666><s%> the righteous acts יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צִדְקֹ֥ת <S%H6666><s%> [even] the righteous acts פִּרְזֹנ֖וֹ <S%H6520><s%> [toward the inhabitants] of his villages בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel אָ֛ז <S%H227><s%> Then יָרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> go down לַשְּׁעָרִ֖ים <S%H8179><s%> to the gates עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> then shall the people יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

עוּרִ֤י <S%H5782><s%> Awake עוּרִי֙ <S%H5782><s%> awake דְּבוֹרָ֔ה <S%H1683><s%> Deborah ע֥וּרִי <S%H5782><s%> awake ע֖וּרִי <S%H5782><s%> awake דַּבְּרִי־ <S%H1696><s%> utter שִׁ֑יר <S%H7892><s%> a song ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> arise בָּרָ֛ק <S%H1301><s%> Barak וּֽשֲׁבֵ֥ה <S%H7628><s%> and lead thy captivity שֶׁבְיְךָ֖ <S%H7617><s%> captive בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> thou son אֲבִינֹֽעַם׃ <S%H42><s%> of Abinoam

אָ֚ז <S%H227><s%> Then יְרַ֣ד <S%H7287><s%> have dominion שָׂרִ֔יד <S%H8300><s%> Then he made him that remaineth לְאַדִּירִ֖ים <S%H117><s%> over the nobles עָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> among the people יְהוָ֕ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יְרַד־ <S%H7287><s%> made me have dominion לִ֖י בַּגִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> over the mighty

מִנִּ֣י <S%H4480><s%> From אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> Out of Ephraim שָׁרְשָׁם֙ <S%H8328><s%> [was there] a root בַּעֲמָלֵ֔ק <S%H6002><s%> of them against Amalek אַחֲרֶ֥יךָ <S%H310><s%> after בִנְיָמִ֖ין <S%H1144><s%> thee Benjamin בַּֽעֲמָמֶ֑יךָ <S%H5971><s%> among thy people מִנִּ֣י <S%H4480><s%> From מָכִ֗יר <S%H4353><s%> out of Machir יָֽרְדוּ֙ <S%H3381><s%> came down מְחֹ֣קְקִ֔ים <S%H2710><s%> governors וּמִ֨זְּבוּלֻ֔ן <S%H2074><s%> and out of Zebulun מֹשְׁכִ֖ים <S%H4900><s%> they that handle בְּשֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the pen סֹפֵֽר׃ <S%H5608><s%> of the writer

וְשָׂרַ֤י <S%H8269><s%> And the princes בְּיִשָּׂשכָר֙ <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with דְּבֹרָ֔ה <S%H1683><s%> [were] with Deborah וְיִשָּׂשכָר֙ <S%H3485><s%> even Issachar כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so בָּרָ֔ק <S%H1301><s%> and also Barak בָּעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> into the valley שֻׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> he was sent בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> on foot בִּפְלַגּ֣וֹת <S%H6391><s%> division רְאוּבֵ֔ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben גְּדֹלִ֖ים <S%H1419><s%> [there were] great חִקְקֵי־ <S%H2711><s%> thoughts לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> of heart

לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why יָשַׁ֗בְתָּ <S%H3427><s%> Why abodest בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> thou among הַֽמִּשְׁפְּתַ֔יִם <S%H4942><s%> the sheepfolds לִשְׁמֹ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> to hear שְׁרִק֣וֹת <S%H8292><s%> the bleatings עֲדָרִ֑ים <S%H5739><s%> drove לִפְלַגּ֣וֹת <S%H6391><s%> division רְאוּבֵ֔ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben גְּדוֹלִ֖ים <S%H1419><s%> [there were] great חִקְרֵי־ <S%H2714><s%> searchings לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> of heart

גִּלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead בְּעֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> beyond הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan שָׁכֵ֔ן <S%H7931><s%> abode וְדָ֕ן <S%H1835><s%> and why did Dan לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> and why יָג֖וּר <S%H1481><s%> remain אֳנִיּ֑וֹת <S%H591><s%> ship אָשֵׁ֗ר <S%H836><s%> Asher יָשַׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> continued לְח֣וֹף <S%H2348><s%> shore יַמִּ֔ים <S%H3220><s%> on the sea וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and מִפְרָצָ֖יו <S%H4664><s%> in his breaches יִשְׁכּֽוֹן׃ <S%H7931><s%> and abode

זְבֻל֗וּן <S%H2074><s%> Zebulun עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> [were] a people חֵרֵ֥ף <S%H2778><s%> [that] jeoparded נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <S%H5315><s%> their lives לָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> unto the death וְנַפְתָּלִ֑י <S%H5321><s%> and Naphtali עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on מְרוֹמֵ֥י <S%H4791><s%> in the high places שָׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field

בָּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> came מְלָכִים֙ <S%H4428><s%> The kings נִלְחָ֔מוּ <S%H3898><s%> [and] fought אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> Then נִלְחֲמוּ֙ <S%H3898><s%> then fought מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> the kings כְנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan בְּתַעְנַ֖ךְ <S%H8590><s%> in Taanach עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> near מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> by the waters מְגִדּ֑וֹ <S%H4023><s%> of Megiddo בֶּ֥צַע <S%H1215><s%> no gain כֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of money לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no לָקָֽחוּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> they took

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from שָׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven נִלְחָ֑מוּ <S%H3898><s%> They fought הַכּֽוֹכָבִים֙ <S%H3556><s%> the stars מִמְּסִלּוֹתָ֔ם <S%H4546><s%> in their courses נִלְחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> fought עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against סִיסְרָֽא׃ <S%H5516><s%> against Sisera

נַ֤חַל <S%H5158><s%> The river קִישׁוֹן֙ <S%H7028><s%> of Kishon גְּרָפָ֔ם <S%H1640><s%> swept them away נַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> river קְדוּמִ֖ים <S%H6917><s%> that ancient נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> the river קִישׁ֑וֹן <S%H7028><s%> Kishon תִּדְרְכִ֥י <S%H1869><s%> thou hast trodden down נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> O my soul עֹֽז׃ <S%H5797><s%> strength

אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> Then הָלְמ֖וּ <S%H1986><s%> broken עִקְּבֵי־ <S%H6119><s%> hoofs ס֑וּס <S%H5483><s%> the horses' מִֽדַּהֲר֖וֹת <S%H1726><s%> by the means of the pransings דַּהֲר֥וֹת <S%H1726><s%> the pransings אַבִּירָֽיו׃ <S%H47><s%> of their mighty ones

א֣וֹרוּ <S%H779><s%> Curse מֵר֗וֹז <S%H4789><s%> ye Meroz אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> said מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> the angel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֹ֥רוּ <S%H779><s%> curse אָר֖וֹר <S%H779><s%> ye bitterly יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not בָ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> thereof because they came לְעֶזְרַ֣ת <S%H5833><s%> not to the help יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְעֶזְרַ֥ת <S%H5833><s%> to the help יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בַּגִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> against the mighty

תְּבֹרַךְ֙ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed מִנָּשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> above women יָעֵ֕ל <S%H3278><s%> shall Jael אֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> the wife חֶ֣בֶר <S%H2268><s%> of Heber הַקֵּינִ֑י <S%H7017><s%> the Kenite מִנָּשִׁ֥ים <S%H802><s%> shall she be above women בָּאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tent תְּבֹרָֽךְ׃ <S%H1288><s%> be blessed

מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> water שָׁאַ֖ל <S%H7592><s%> He asked חָלָ֣ב <S%H2461><s%> [him] milk נָתָ֑נָה <S%H5414><s%> [and] she gave בְּסֵ֥פֶל <S%H5602><s%> dish אַדִּירִ֖ים <S%H117><s%> in a lordly הִקְרִ֥יבָה <S%H7126><s%> she brought forth חֶמְאָֽה׃ <S%H2529><s%> butter

יָדָהּ֙ <S%H3027><s%> her hand לַיָּתֵ֣ד <S%H3489><s%> to the nail תִּשְׁלַ֔חְנָה <S%H7971><s%> She put וִֽימִינָ֖הּ <S%H3225><s%> and her right hand לְהַלְמ֣וּת <S%H1989><s%> hammer עֲמֵלִ֑ים <S%H6001><s%> to the workmen's וְהָלְמָ֤ה <S%H1986><s%> and with the hammer she smote סִֽיסְרָא֙ <S%H5516><s%> Sisera מָחֲקָ֣ה <S%H4277><s%> she smote off רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> his head וּמָחֲצָ֥ה <S%H4272><s%> when she had pierced וְחָלְפָ֖ה <S%H2498><s%> and stricken through רַקָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H7541><s%> his temples

בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> Between רַגְלֶ֔יהָ <S%H7272><s%> At her feet כָּרַ֥ע <S%H3766><s%> he bowed נָפַ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> he fell שָׁכָ֑ב <S%H7901><s%> he lay down בֵּ֤ין <S%H996><s%> Between רַגְלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H7272><s%> at her feet כָּרַ֣ע <S%H3766><s%> he bowed נָפָ֔ל <S%H5307><s%> he fell בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> where כָּרַ֔ע <S%H3766><s%> he bowed שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there נָפַ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> there he fell down שָׁדֽוּד׃ <S%H7703><s%> dead
